title: /execute指令问题
txt_content:
我想让拿着金锄头的玩家让自己半径3格(不包括自己)的玩家持续得到中毒I效果，我是怎么想的
记分板创建Gold目标 /scoreboard objectives add Gold dummy
高频检测让拿着金锄头的玩家Gold目标设定为1 /scoreboard players set @a Gold 1 {SelectedItem:{id:minecraft:golden_hoe,Count:1b}}
高频/execute @a[score_Gold_min=1,score_Gold=1] ~ ~ ~ /effect @a[r=3] minecraft:poison 1 0 true
但是我发现会让自己中毒
我相信不需要图吧

replies.txt_content:

/execute @a[score_Gold_min=1,score_Gold=1,score_xxx=0] ~ ~ ~ /effect @a[score_Gold_min=1,score_Gold=1,score_xxx=0] clear复制代码
